hero.title: About Us

ceo.label: CEO Message
ceo.title: CEO Message
ceo.intro: Raon Total Solution aims to be your premier partner, maximizing customer value through 30 years of accumulated experience and technical expertise in the oil refinery, petrochemical, and shipbuilding industries.
ceo.quote:
All employees of Raon Total Solution
will continue to strive
to provide the highest quality and service
under the belief of 'customer first'.
ceo.partnership: Through close cooperation with global partners, we supply the latest technology and products domestically, and together we create your success through rapid delivery and professional technical support.
ceo.commitment: We will continue to grow as a trusted business partner that provides the highest value to our customers through unwavering trust and innovation.

history.label: Company History
history.title: History
history.description: The Growth Journey of Raon Total Solution from 2020 to Present

events: Signed Korean agency contract with Chinese Cylinder liner manufacturer (WTQ)
Signed Ulsan agency contract with CP pump systems (Swiss)
Signed agency contract with FIMA (Germany) Compressor manufacturer
Signed Ulsan agency contract with NEUMAN&ESSER
Signed agency contract with Turbolink (Oil Refinery/Petrochemical sector)
Signed Korean Master Agency contract with SPX Flow Technology
Changed company name to Raon Total Solution Co., Ltd. (Corporate conversion)
Signed agency contract with Castanet (France) Wearing Parts
Signed agency contract with American Valve manufacturer

oilRefinery.heroDescription: Providing professional solutions for reciprocating compressors and rotating machinery based on 30 years of experience and know-how
oilRefinery.imageCaption: Industrial compressors and rotating machinery systems operating in oil refinery and petrochemical plants
oilRefinery.intro1: Raon Total Solution is a specialized company providing spare parts and engineering solutions for reciprocating compressors and rotating machinery.
oilRefinery.intro2: We provide services tailored to the needs of various industries based on approximately 30 years of experience and know-how.
services: All spare parts for valves, piston rings, and related products

shipbuilding.title: Shipbuilding
shipbuilding.subtitle: Ship Building
shipbuilding.description: Supplying cylinder liners, motors, bearings and other marine parts for the shipbuilding industry
shipbuilding.heroDescription: Supplying high-quality marine parts as the Korean agent for Chinese cylinder liner manufacturer (WTQ) located in Yangzhou
shipbuilding.imageCaption: High-quality cylinder liners and marine equipment used in large-scale shipbuilding sites
shipbuilding.intro1: We are the Korean agent for WTQ, a cylinder liner manufacturer located in Yangzhou, China, supplying cylinder liners with diameters ranging from 480 to 1500mm.
shipbuilding.intro2: WTQ is one of the major manufacturers in China producing ship main engine cylinder liners, and opened a Korean agency in 2025.
shipbuilding.intro3: We guarantee stable quality and rapid delivery with globally certified products.
services: Cylinder liners for commercial vehicles, construction machinery, and locomotives
Cylinder liners for ships and marine use
Liners for sludge pumps and hydraulic cylinders
Cylinder liners for compressors and generator units
